member.name: FaceRectInfoBlobHeader
member.summary: The FaceRectInfoBlobHeader structure describes the size and count information of the blob format for the MF_CAPTURE_METADATA_FACEROIS attribute.

member.name: FaceRectInfoBlobHeader.Size
member.summary: Size of this header + all following structures.

member.name: FaceRectInfoBlobHeader.Count
member.summary: Number of FaceRectInfo structures in the blob.
